name: Solar Crystal
description:
In Solar Crystal you play as a little Plant Character called Pip. He is on his way back to  the only left Plant village to bring back Solar Crystals for the Tree of life. 

The Tree is protecting the few left Plant folk from the Crystal dust which is poisonous for them. 

Help Pip to go back to his village and jump and run your way across various traps and Plattforms.

Controls
  • Move (WASD / Arrowkeys  /  Left stick)
  • Look (Left Stick/ Right Stick)
  • Interact (E / Button East)
How to play
  • Download
  • Unzip the Game
  • Play and have fun!
Credits

My teachers and all of my class for helping me with the game.
